content:
Certainly! Here is a sample survey with 20 thought-provoking questions to assess a team's current level of maturity as a high performing team:

1. Our team clearly understands its purpose and goals.
2. We have well-defined roles and responsibilities within the team.
3. Our team consistently meets or exceeds its goals and objectives.
4. Our team members are held accountable for their actions and responsibilities.
5. Our team has a strong sense of trust and mutual respect.
6. Our team is able to effectively resolve conflicts and disagreements.
7. Our team has a strong culture of collaboration and teamwork.
8. Our team has a clear and effective communication process.
9. Our team consistently seeks and incorporates feedback to improve performance.
10. Our team members are self-aware and understand their strengths and weaknesses.
11. Our team is open to constructive criticism and feedback.
12. Our team has a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
13. Our team actively seeks out and implements new ideas and best practices.
14. Our team is flexible and adaptable to changing circumstances and priorities.
15. Our team is committed to excellence and delivering high-quality work.
16. Our team is proactive and takes initiative to solve problems.
17. Our team is able to effectively manage time and resources to achieve goals.
18. Our team members demonstrate a high level of professionalism and integrity.
19. Our team has a clear and effective decision-making process.
20. Our team members feel empowered and valued for their contributions.

Please rate your level of agreement with each statement on a scale of 1-4 (Strongly Agree, Agree, Disagree, Strongly Disagree).
